![The Evolution of Unlock Protocol: An Illustrated History](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/586d2d9820b95971a2ff8e6e156dd41e.jpg)

<p>Understanding where we’ve been is key to understanding where we’re going. Since its inception, Unlock Protocol has been on a mission to revolutionize access control and membership models through decentralized technology. What started as a bold vision to empower creators, developers, and communities with onchain memberships has evolved into a robust ecosystem embraced across industries.</p><p>To showcase this journey, we’ve created the <strong>Unlock Protocol Timeline Infographic</strong>, detailing key milestones, technological advancements, and pivotal moments that have shaped the Unlock community's growth. From our earliest smart contract deployments to integrations with major platforms and the expansion of our ecosystem, this timeline reflects not just our collective progress but the broader movement toward open, user-owned access on the web.</p><p>Explore the timeline below to see how Unlock Protocol has evolved—and get a glimpse of what’s ahead.</p><p><em>Unlock Protocol Timeline Infographic designed by Unlock community member </em><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/Capt_Southpaw"><em>@capt_southpaw</em></a></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/the-evolution-of-unlock-protocol--an-illustrated-history/7901036b1b55375979cef76500ce96a1.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="3600" nextwidth="1000" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p></p>
